item.title: Professor Ziyu Lyu Joins SYSU School of Cyber Science and Technology
item.description: We are pleased to announce that Professor Ziyu Lyu officially joined the School of Cyber Science and Technology at Sun Yat-sen University in September 2023, serving as Associate Professor and Ph.D. Supervisor.
